story.title: My Story: Beyond the Code
story.subtitle: A Testament to Persistence and Passion
story.p1: My career began not in front of a screen, but with my hands—mastering trades like professional hairstyling, culinary arts, and operating heavy machinery. These roles taught me discipline, attention to detail, and the art of client satisfaction.
story.p2: However, a deep‑seated curiosity for how things work led me to the world of technology. I embarked on an intense journey of self‑directed learning, dedicating thousands of hours to mastering software engineering from the ground up.
story.p3: This culminated in my acceptance and outstanding performance in the ALX Software Engineering program, a rigorous 18‑month curriculum where I solidified my skills in full‑stack development, algorithms, and system design, finishing with a score of 106.76%.
